[Subject] hangs with one right hand gripping a crevice in the coral while the left hand reaches for a magnesium chalk bag at the waist. [Subject] wears a rock climbing helmet with an EPS logo and looks upward toward the camera. The camera is positioned vertically above, capturing ocean waves far below. [Subject] is shirtless, showing defined climber musculature, fingers covered in magnesium chalk dust, and face covered in sweat. Hyper-detailed, dramatic outdoor realism.

A matte white rectangular gift box rests on a polished light wood tabletop. The lid slowly opens, revealing a sleek modern VR headset nestled in custom black lining. As the lid opens fully, the headset hovers above the box, transitioning into a black void. The headset suddenly disintegrates into floating components—display, lenses, optics, circuit boards, chips, headband elements—arranged in a perfect circular formation. After a brief pause, the components rapidly reassemble with synchronized mechanical sounds. The completed headset slowly rotates under a spotlight, showcasing its futuristic design.
